title: Dengue Outbreak — Maharashtra (Pune & Mumbai)
description: 390 confirmed cases in the past 14 days across Pune and Mumbai districts. Vector control teams deployed. Hospital surge capacity activated.

title: Influenza A Surge — Delhi NCR
description: 45% increase in Influenza A (H3N2) cases compared to previous month. ICU admissions up 22%. Vaccination drive recommended.

title: Malaria Cluster — Northeast Region
description: 63 cases of P. falciparum malaria reported in Assam and Meghalaya. Insecticide-treated nets distributed to affected areas.

title: Tuberculosis Case Cluster — Varanasi District
description: 12 new MDR-TB cases identified in a 2-week period. Contact tracing for 180+ individuals initiated. DOTS programme reinforced.

title: COVID-19 Sub-variant Monitoring — Pan-India
description: New JN.1.4 sub-variant detected in 8 states. No significant increase in hospitalization. Genomic surveillance continued.

title: Chikungunya Rise — Kerala (Coastal Districts)
description: 92 cases reported across Ernakulam and Alappuzha districts. 22% increase from previous fortnight. Fogging operations underway.
